function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of local infrastructure to support COVID-19 response","Impact":"Increased risk of virus spread and lack of medical support","Mitigation":"Invest in building local infrastructure and medical facilities","Technologies":"Telemedicine, mobile clinics, medical supplies","People":"Tikuna, Yagua, and Cocama Indians","Owner":"Local government, NGOs, private sector"},{"Description":"Reliance on traditional medicine for virus protection","Impact":"Potential lack of effectiveness in treating COVID-19","Mitigation":"Combine traditional medicine with modern medical practices and treatments","Technologies":"Medical testing, vaccines, modern medical facilities","People":"Local communities","Owner":"Local healthcare authorities, NGOs, medical professionals"},{"Description":"Limited access to clean water and sanitation","Impact":"Higher risk of infection due to poor hygiene and sanitation","Mitigation":"Improve access to clean water and sanitation facilities","Technologies":"Water purification systems, sanitation infrastructure","People":"Local communities","Owner":"Local government, NGOs, private sector"}]}
